chat_history.message: Hello, my iPhone 12 has a problem: My package hasn't arrived yet. Thank you,

Dear ecomobile 

Nice to meet you, this is Manuel of Back Market. I hope this message finds you well and starting a terrific weekend.

The TN states that the package of the customer was delivered at a pickup Point.

Could you tell us the address, please?

Remember that if it is not possible, we must start a carrier investigation due to a lost parcel.

Thank you, 
Manuel from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

The address is FNX-SAN PEDRO DE LA SUERT , 19 CORDOBA CALLE , SAN PEDRO DE ALCANTARA , 29670 , ES. It seems that the customer has already picked up the parcel according to the tracking link.

Regards,
RK
